extension.name: Content - AddThis All In One Social Network Buttons
extension.author: Leon W.
extension.description: You can have all social network buttons or box counters from Facebook, Google Buzz, Twitter, StumbleUpon, Digg, MySpace, Delicious all in one plugin with AddThis free service in your content article.

field.name: content_tobe_excluded
field.label: Excluded Content
field.description: Type in Content (Article) Id to be excluded with comma

field.name: category_tobe_excluded
field.label: Excluded Categories
field.description: Type in Categories Id to be excluded with comma

field.name: pub_id
field.label: Your AddThis Publisher ID
field.description: You can register one for free at AddThis.com or leave it with the default publisher ID to ensure plugin is working.

field.name: track_this
field.label: Track Traffic
field.description: If you enable this, please ensure to use your own Publisher ID by registering one free account at AddThis.com

field.name: style
field.label: Style
field.description: Style of the buttons to be displayed
